channel.title: How to create and add a custom NPC?
channel.description:
How would I do this? Is it the same as making models with Mesquiitia? Or however you say it.
Also, How do I make the face in the dialogue box?

item.description:
@T41 wrote:

  1. Custom NPCs are usually hardcoded by most moparscapers in Class8(?), perhaps 5 in a non-refactored land.

  2. Itâ€™s apart of the chat dialogue packet most likely. Check out http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/
